messages.subject: ATTENTION all Always Learning readers
messages.msgSnippet: It s been a busy morning.  I ve approved posts that were left in the queue by other moderators because they were questionable.  If you think some of today s
messages.messageBody:
It's been a busy morning. I've approved posts that were left in the
queue by other moderators because they were questionable. If you
think some of today's posts maybe shouldn't have been let through, so
do others. Let that slide.

One was returned for saying "Thanks/good idea" (basically) and
appending a VERY long post. Not good.

One was returned for being a long unbroken piece of writing punctuated
by streams of all caps. Not good.

Edit your own posts carefully before you send them. Think about
whether it's good for this list or not. If you're not sure, you can
read more about the list here and at the links from that page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AlwaysLearning/

Sandra, the listowner
